data.persona: I am the Princess. My father is the Queen. My mother is dead and my father is about to marry a horrible woman.
data.description:
You are in the The Bottlery.
The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown and a gown.

data.short_motivation: I want to feel safe and momentarily forget my worries
data.mid_motivation: I want to draw closer to my father to make him listen to me
data.long_motivation: I want to convince him to cancel his plans of marrying the horrible woman by the next month

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get king to talk about himself
